data.name: Whatsapp Web - Fullscreen
data.description: Make fullscreen WhatsApp Web. Expand the area of chat in WhatsApp Web for big screens. When you open WhatsApp Web in a big screen the chat area is kind of small so I decided to expand that area. Screenshots: Before After Chrome Extension: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/fullscreen-whatsapp-web/igdbejmefbphijhiinkfhhpaeamfnpmf?utm_source=chrome-ntp-icon

data.name: De-rounding Twitter (Works with New Lay-out)
data.description:
Like Twitter but hate its new rounded appearance? Well I've got the fix for you! 

Just a couple CSS tweaks for the UI's overall appearance. Softly rounded corners on avatars and buttons instead of full on circles as seen in the site's current iteration.

Tested and working on twitter.com and mobile.twitter.com

data.name: sad anime roblox
Scrollbar Custom - KMV
data.description:
Custom Scrollbars


Tested on Brave, Chrome, Chromium, Firefox, Firefox Nightly & Tor.

Incompatible with Waterfox for the time being.

Arrow-Colour is reserved for Brave, Chrome and Chromium 'till Mozilla decides otherwise.


Theme is in the Public Domain.
Feel free to use as one sees fit - include it in your own theme without asking.


The rest of my themes:
https://userstyles.org/users/370722/

Contact:
https://www.reddit.com/r/KMV/

user.name: KMVerum
user.about:
/*

NOTICE:

All my Themes are designed for Stylus;
https://add0n.com/stylus.html

I stopped using Stylish in 2017 when the owner sold us out, and began selling user data:
https://forum.userstyles.org/discussion/53233/announcement-to-the-community

Stylus became the fork of Stylish when this happened.

Stylish has since altered their code to the point where many old CSS standards aren't accepted anymore.
This is especially troublesome on Chrome.

As an example to this:
-My YouTube Dark Theme (as of Oct. 2019), consisted of 1459 lines and works fine in Stylus, but had 866 errors in Stylish.

The time and effort needed to correct all errors on an already working code is a no-go.
More importantly; Privacy is of much greater concern to me.

Description from Stylus website;
"Any and all analytics, telemetry, and data-collection have been removed completely."

PS; If you're on Firefox; They've done pretty much the same thing.
-Waterfox is the alternative;
https://www.waterfox.net/

My themes also work on Tor.

*/
